level.heading: EVENT VENUE VALET PARKING STAGING ZONES (ยง 24-1610)

level.text: The location(s) and dimensions of all Valet Staging Zone(s) shall be determined by the Department.

The Department shall issue Emergency No Parking signs to be posted by the Permittee at least seventy-two (72) hours in advance of the day that Valet Parking services shall be provided to indicate the Valet Staging Zone for Event Venue Valet Parking.
The Valet Staging Zone shall be used by the Permittee only during the hours and days posted on the signs issued in accordance with section 1610.2 of this chapter.

Only motor vehicles engaged in Valet Parking shall occupy space in a Valet Staging Zone provided that the operator of a motor vehicle may stop momentarily in a Valet Staging Zone to discharge or pick-up passengers.
